overview: MTV Unplugged is a live album by Giorgia, recorded during the MTV television broadcast of the same name in an acoustic version in Milan on April 29, 2005. It is the first Italian MTV Unplugged. During the same concert the DVD of the same name was recorded and released on the market a few months later.  In the press conference that followed the concert, the Roman singer also said she was a bit tired of singing, also due to the pressures in the record industry. So then it was not, because after the Unplugged Giorgia worked on other projects and in 2007 she also released a new album, Stonata.
title: Giorgia MTV Unplugged
